full_description:
FONENG BL138 True Wireless Earbuds

The FONENG BL138 True Wireless Earbuds offer strong connectivity thanks to their advanced Bluetooth 5.3 stable technology. With their 45-degree oblique in-ear design, these earbuds guarantee a snug and pleasant fit even after prolonged use. A single tap may be used to easily control playback and calls thanks to the touch adjustment feature. These FONENG BL138 True Wireless Earbuds ensure a remarkable audio experience throughout the 20Hz–20KHz frequency range by producing clear and immersive sound production with Brass Ring Horn technology. Superior PC and Silica gel materials are used in its construction, combining comfort and durability for daily usage. The touch control with one hand is simple to use. It is possible to perform tasks like playing, cutting music, connecting the phone, and more with finger touch. With the easy-to-use Type-C connection on the FONENG BL138 True Wireless Earbuds, charging is a breeze. With only one earbud charge, you may listen to music for up to four or five hours, with a further twelve hours on standby. Additionally, the charging case adds 250mAh to the battery capacity, allowing for longer on-the-go listening sessions. Ten meters is the connection range, so you can walk around freely without having to worry about signal loss. The FONENG BL138 True Wireless Earbuds, which come in stylish black, offer the best wireless audio experience.
